listing.name: Beach Bay Realty
listing.description: Beach Bay Realty "specializes in properties located between the Beach & the Bay on Virginia's beautiful Eastern Shore." Whether you are looking to buy or sell a house, town home, condo, land, farm, or commercial property in or around Accomack County, including the towns of Chincoteague, Onancock, Wallops Island, Greenbackville, Temperenceville or the surrounding areas then you have come to the right website. Here you will find a wide array of information about local real estate for sale.

listing.name: Coldwell Banker Harbour Realty
listing.description: Whether you are in the market to buy or sell property in beautiful Chincoteague Island or Accomack County we offer over 40 years combined real estate experience. From purchasing a vacation home, relocating with NASA or Wallops Flight Facility to the first time home buyer we can help with every step. We invite you to visit our web site to search for your next Single Family Home, Condominium, Townhouse, Land, or Commercial real estate purchase.

listing.name: Dockside Properties
listing.description: Dockside Properties, located on Chincoteague Island, has been serving the beautiful Eastern Shore of Virginia proudly for over 15 years and now servicing Maryland as well. Here at Dockside we understand that buying or selling a home is more than just a transaction: it's a life-changing experience. That’s why our team of highly-seasoned real estate professionals is dedicated to providing exceptional, personalized service for all of our clients. We take great pride in the relationships we build and always work relentlessly on the client’s behalf to help them achieve their real estate goals.

listing.name: Eastern Shore Properties
listing.description: Eastern Shore Properties can assist you with all of your property needs. We have many waterfront and non-waterfront homes, as well as commercial properties for sale. We can help with the entire process of buying a home - to finding the perfect lot - to assisting you with finding a contractor to build your "dream home" or finding a place for your new business. We also offer properties for sale in the surrounding areas. We are located just across from the Chincoteague Chamber of Commerce building on the traffic circle as you go to Assateague.

listing.name: Keller Williams Delmarva
listing.description: Dreaming of owning your very own piece of Paradise on the Eastern Shore of Virginia? Welcome to Keller Williams Delmarva - here to serve all of your Real Estate needs on beautiful Chincoteague Island & beyond. We began our business with the belief that there is a better way to Buy & Sell Homes here on the Shore. Our personal service, attention to detail, tireless attitude, & knowledge of the ESVA makes us your best choice. We are also the leading area experts for Property Management & Vacation Rentals utilizing the latest Technology in both industries! Let us help you Buy the Beach!

listing.name: Long & Foster Chincoteague
listing.description: We've been serving Chincoteague Island and the surrounding area since 1991. We provide good honest service with straight answers! Purchasing a home is one of the biggest decisions most people will make in their life. You want to make sure that you make a good buying decision based on accurate information. We know the market well and can help you navigate through the entire process, from beginning your search to closing the deal.

listing.name: Ocean East Realty
listing.description: Considering selling your property, planning to relocate, looking to purchase real estate on Chincoteague or surrounding areas of Virginia's Eastern Shore? Ocean East Realty is here to help. We offer hands on assistance to familiarize you with all that Chincoteague Island has to offer. We pride ourselves with having direct contact with each of our clients and maintaining open lines of communication. Our goal is to help you find that island home you've always dreamed of. Ocean East Realty is a locally owned company established by island natives, Linda Budd & Donna Jones. Linda & Donna have brought together a team of friendly professionals who are passionate about Chincoteague Island and all that it has to offer.

listing.name: Seaside Properties
listing.description: Whether you are in the market to buy or sell property, Seaside Properties on beautiful Chincoteague Island is here to help. We invite you to visit our web site to search for your next Single Family Home, Condominium, Townhouse, Land, or Commercial Real Estate purchase. Let us help you find your Happy Place in the Sun! We offer a full suite of Real Estate services to include Sales, Rentals, Vacation Rentals, and Property Management. No matter what your Real Estate needs from Chincoteage to Captains Cove and beyond, we can fullfil all your Real Estate service needs.
